title: Coronavirus: French care home fights to keep Covid-19 at bay
description: How a home in Burgundy seeks to protect more than 100 vulnerable residents and staff from Covid-19.
content:
Image copyrightThai-Binh Phan-VanImage caption
 The grounds of Résidence Saint-Julien remain open to residents, as long as they keep away from each other
Care homes have become a vulnerable front in the fight against coronavirus - and in France they account… [+4026 chars]
